backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining user profiles, trades, mistakes, subscriptions, payments, admin auth, and QR code upload with authorization mixins and stable state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related files, components, and tests with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text summaries of numerous frontend files describing each component’s purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining gold–charcoal color variables for light/dark modes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading theme settings, runtime env loader, Google Fonts, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/domain-slug.txt: Contains the deployment domain slug for the frontend.
frontend/public/env.json: Holds the backend canister ID used for runtime configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, backend connection state, tab navigation, errors, and UI layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Provides a password prompt dialog for unlocking admin access with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDisco: Manages creation, editing, toggling, and deletion of discount codes using admin query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Main admin dashboard displaying user management, payments, discounts, QR code tools, and navigation between views.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPayme: Handles creation, editing, enabling/disabling, and deletion of payment methods through admin APIs.
Allows uploading, previewing, clearing, and validating a payment QR code with progress tracking.
Displays pending payments and enables admins to approve, reject, or view submitted payment proofs.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRotat: Dialog for permanent admins to rotate the admin password with validation, success/error handling, and permission checks.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUserD: Admin dialog showing detailed user info, subscription status, and actions to activate, cancel, or remove user accounts.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with status display and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/journal/EditTrad: Dialog to edit or delete a trade entry, updating fields and confirming deletions via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalA: Displays key journal analytics such as total trades, accuracy, and total P/L with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/journal/ProfitCa: Calendar view summarizing daily net P/L and trade counts with month navigation and date selection.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradeEnt: Form component for creating new trade entries, handling input state, validation, and submission to the backend.
frontend/src/components/journal/TradeLis: Displays a table of recorded trades with formatting, P/L calculation, and optional edit actions.
frontend/src/components/mistakes/EditMis: Dialog for editing or deleting a mistake entry with form handling and confirmation UI.
frontend/src/components/mistakes/Mistake: Form for logging new trading mistakes including category, date, and description submission.
Lists mistake entries with category labels, descriptions, AI suggestions, and edit capability.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Bottom navigation bar rendering tabs with icons and active state handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: A dialog collecting full name and username to create a user profile and start a 2‑day trial, with form validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/subscriptions/Pa: Handles subscription payment submission including QR code display, PDF upload validation, transaction details, and success confirmation.
frontend/src/components/subscriptions/Su: Displays subscription state, trial status, and available plans, routing users to payment when a plan is selected.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithStatus.ts: Manages backend actor initialization with detailed connection status, retries, timeouts, and health checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useEntitlement.ts: Determines feature access based on the user's subscription or trial state, returning entitlement flags and loading status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider to manage Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for initializing user access and performing CRUD operations on trades and mistakes via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Custom hook to manage light/dark theme with localStorage persistence and document class updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables, layout utilities, and UI layering fixes.
frontend/src/lib/backendConnectionErrors: Classifies backend errors into user-friendly categories such as misconfiguration, authorization, and stopped canisters with retry guidance.
frontend/src/lib/backendDiagnostics.ts: Collects diagnostic data about backend canister IDs, environment, and deployment type to detect configuration issues.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Defines static branding constants including app name, tagline, and logo path.
frontend/src/lib/domainSlug.ts: Validates and generates domain slugs following character and length rules, including a predefined app slug.
frontend/src/lib/pipValues.ts: Stores pip values for major forex pairs and exposes a helper to retrieve them or null for unsupported pairs.
frontend/src/lib/riskCalculator.ts: Provides pip value lookup and a lot-size calculator with validation for risk, stop loss, and pip value.
frontend/src/lib/safeErrorMessage.ts: Maps various backend error strings to user-friendly messages, handling payment, admin, subscription, profile, trade, and network errors.
frontend/src/lib/trades.ts: Provides helper functions to calculate trade P/L and format currency or signed amounts.
frontend/src/lib/tradingPairs.ts: Defines trading pair option types and exports lists of standard and calculator-specific trading pairs.
frontend/src/lib/userId.ts: Formats and parses sequential user IDs in the #000001 display format.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/tabs/AdminPanelTab.tsx: Checks admin status and displays the AdminPanel or an unlock dialog based on authorization state.
frontend/src/tabs/JournalTab.tsx: Displays trade analytics, entry form, list, and a calendar view with date-based trade filtering.
frontend/src/tabs/MistakesTab.tsx: Shows an AI‑learning prompt and renders forms and lists for logging trading mistakes.
frontend/src/tabs/ProfileTab.tsx: Displays the user's profile details, identity info, and appearance settings if available.
frontend/src/tabs/RiskCalculatorTab.tsx: Implements a risk calculator UI that computes lot size based on account settings, risk mode, pip value, and SL distance.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters from query or hash, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Tracks project rebuild status, known issues, feature requirements, and requested UI/logo updates.
